Modules

core.delivery_system

core.module_management

Modules are add-ons to the model that change its behaviour.

core.parametriser

core.read_config

core.results_aggregator

core.scenario_loader

core.simulation_manager

Architecture: iterate of scenarios, iterate on parameters of scenarios, iterate on same parameters. For last level, can be hard reboot simulation every N simulations or not (batches). Within batches, can be parallelised or not.
